account.title: Your account
account.subtitle: Change basic settings about your Taiga account.

delete.msg: Sorry to see you go, @{{ username }}.

explain.title: What will happen:
explain.access: You will lose access to Taiga
explain.delete_data: We will delete your personal data and your name will disappear from the platform.
explain.shared: The content you've created shared with other people will remain in the platform.

delete.confirm_msg: I understand that the deletion is final and there will be no way to restore your account.
delete.confirm_delete_error: Please, confirm that you understand the consequences of deleting your account.

confirmation_modal.title: Before deleting your account
confirmation_modal.description: There are some issues that need your attention before deleting your account
confirmation_modal.only_admin_projects: {projects, plural, one {You are the only administrator in one project.} other {You are the only administrator in some projects.}}
confirmation_modal.only_admin_workspaces: {workspaces, plural, one {You are the only member in one workspace.} other {You are the only member in some workspaces.}}
confirmation_modal.project_description: Your role as a project administrator will be moved to another member of the workspace.
confirmation_modal.workspace_description: {workspaces, plural, one {This workspace} other {Those workspaces}} will be deleted, along with the projects within it. You can invite somebody to be a workspace member.
confirmation_modal.workspace_a11y_title: Workspaces where you are the only member
confirmation_modal.project_a11y_title: Projects where you are the only project admin
